name: Hightrail
description:
Hightrail is a fast paced speedrunning game utilising a unique mode of transport... A GUN! 

Blast your way through through the ethereal level and reach the goal in the fastest time, or, take it slow and explore to discover hidden pickups and take in the ambience. 

Send us your best times on the discussion board or on twitter via the link on our profile! 

Information:
- See "How To Play" on the main menu page for controls and tips.
- Headphones recommended.
- Optimised for standard 16:9 aspect ratio.
- Mouse and Keyboard control only.
- Steam art, icons etc. included in .zip for addition to Steam Libraries.
